page.title: 01Plungar Barkestone Redmile
page.content: { The villages are each approximately a mile apart,with Barkestone being the central one.The area is largely agricultural though in recent years some commuters now live in the villages and travel to nearby Nottingham Newark or Grantham and some to London. As they are not on a main route linking towns each has a quiet charm of last century though living standards are modern.All main services are available except gas and each village has post office services public houses shops and churches. The roads are quiet except for farm vehicles during the day and in the winter or wet weather they are often very muddy. Several people were born in the villages where they still live and have relatives nearby.
